track.name: All Things
comments: and i like this version more than the one with Roots Manuva
The other version's called All Things To Men (featuring Roots Manuva)
o gawd the world is opening up before my very eyes
Man with a Movie Camera.......good with ingenious film
The Cinematic Orchestra never fail to be utterly brilliant. The version of this Everyday with Roots Manuva on it, and a slightly different mix is one of my favourite songs ever.
Just follow the ride bell...ace drumming.
unexpected time signature? its called jazz
There's a live version of this out there somewhere, with Roots Manuva, performed at the Vancouver Jazz Festival. This song is for my best friend, Dave Kappele.
Kawałek na tym albumie najlepszy - i najsmutniejszy.
that drum part that kicks in at the start, really breaks in with such an unexpected time signature than what you'd expect... great :)
